We are here to simplify the shed buying and installation experience. Experts on what brands and models are the best each year, we will guide you to the right product that best meets your needs. A product you can trust in that will provide you with many years of worry free backyard storage. 


We have been specializing in shed foundations for more than a decade. Whether it be concrete or wood, we will deliver a reliable base that looks great and is built to last. Concrete has the advantage of being animal proof, it can be made with a lower profile to the ground, and will last for 30+ years maintenance-free. Our wood foundations are developed to provide a cost effective option while maintaining integrity against animals, and the wear and tear from the elements.  While they are not 100% animal proof, they are highly resistant! We have designed them to be low to the ground, only about 7", less than the average step. They will last 20+ years.

We have always had attention to detail, as is clear in our reviews on HomeStars, Google, Yellow Pages and other places on the web. What brings us joy and pleasure is doing the best job we can for you. We only hire the best to bring you the best, each is fully trained and most have been with us for many years. We pride ourselves on providing the highest quality service for all your shed need's. We have seen a lot of wood bases and concrete bases built by other companies, far more often than not they are not perfectly level, square, or custom sized for your shed and lack attractiveness. A lot of attention goes into the details of building a foundation that is just right for your model of shed. It’s one of the biggest mistakes one can make when hiring someone to install their shed foundation. Countless times we see how poorly constructed bases fail, and many times homeowners call us to rip out a foundation because it is falling apart after just a couple years or they choose to live with a failing base in order to save the cost of having it rebuilt. 


We are the exclusive shed company that is trusted to build the display sheds for Costco and Lowe's in Southern Ontario. We have installed thousands of these sheds for these stores and for the homeowner’s that buy them for their backyards. No one is more familiar with the installation and these products in Canada then us. We take pride in our work, and it show's. We guarantee that your shed, play set or gazebo will be assembled professionally and we back that up with a lifetime warranty on our workmanship. 


 Our rates are lower then the big box stores and are installed by someone with far more experience! Why have a sub-contractor or handyman that may not have ever built a shed in their life do your installation? They certainly don’t specialize in shed foundations, we know because we have ripped many of them out soon after they left. 


Our primary coverage area is the Greater Toronto area, as far west as Hamilton, east to Oshawa, and north to Newmarket. We will travel further for a travel expense, please contact us for more information.
